text: Team Heizomat Rad-Net () was a UCI Continental team founded in 2008 and based in Motten, Germany. It participates in UCI Continental Circuits races.http://www.procyclingstats.com/team/Team_Heizomat_Radnet_2018 For the 2018 season Team Heizomat, managed by Sportagentur Markus Schleicher GmbH, merged with Rad-Net Rose Team. ==Team roster== ==Major wins== ; 2008 : Stage 3 Rothaus Regio-Tour, Robert Retschke ; 2009 : 20px Points classification Internationale Mainfrankentour, Sebastian Hans :: 20px Mountains classification, Nils Plötner :: Stage 1, Sebastian Hans ; 2010 : Stage 3 Flèche du Sud, Ralf Matzka ==References== Category:UCI Continental Teams (Europe) Category:Cycling teams based in Germany Category:Cycling teams established in 2007
title: Team Heizomat
